title: this is a post for the rito members
body: yes u guys make broken champs like teemo an jhin but you guys are all so one of the nicest people ive seen so far an all of u are great people an have a great day :){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
awww thanks!
Hope doesn't change your opinion but I like teemo :)
